class.name: LabelSettings
class.brief_description: Provides common settings to customize the text in a [Label].
class.description: [LabelSettings] is a resource that provides common settings to customize the text in a [Label]. It will take priority over the properties defined in [member Control.theme]. The resource can be shared between multiple labels and changed on the fly, so it's convenient and flexible way to setup text style.

method.name: add_stacked_outline
method.description: Adds a new stacked outline to the label at the given [param index]. If [param index] is [code]-1[/code], the new stacked outline will be added at the end of the list.

method.name: add_stacked_shadow
method.description: Adds a new stacked shadow to the label at the given [param index]. If [param index] is [code]-1[/code], the new stacked shadow will be added at the end of the list.

method.name: get_stacked_outline_color
method.description: Returns the color of the stacked outline at [param index].

method.name: get_stacked_outline_size
method.description: Returns the size of the stacked outline at [param index].

method.name: get_stacked_shadow_color
method.description: Returns the color of the stacked shadow at [param index].

method.name: get_stacked_shadow_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of the stacked shadow at [param index].

method.name: get_stacked_shadow_outline_size
method.description: Returns the outline size of the stacked shadow at [param index].

method.name: move_stacked_outline
method.description: Moves the stacked outline at index [param from_index] to the given position [param to_position] in the array.

method.name: move_stacked_shadow
method.description: Moves the stacked shadow at index [param from_index] to the given position [param to_position] in the array.

method.name: remove_stacked_outline
method.description: Removes the stacked outline at index [param index].

method.name: remove_stacked_shadow
method.description: Removes the stacked shadow at index [param index].

method.name: set_stacked_outline_color
method.description: Sets the color of the stacked outline identified by the given [param index] to [param color].

method.name: set_stacked_outline_size
method.description: Sets the size of the stacked outline identified by the given [param index] to [param size].

method.name: set_stacked_shadow_color
method.description: Sets the color of the stacked shadow identified by the given [param index] to [param color].

method.name: set_stacked_shadow_offset
method.description: Sets the offset of the stacked shadow identified by the given [param index] to [param offset].

method.name: set_stacked_shadow_outline_size
method.description: Sets the outline size of the stacked shadow identified by the given [param index] to [param size].

members.member: Additional vertical spacing between lines (in pixels), spacing is added to line descent. This value can be negative.
Vertical space between paragraphs. Added on top of [member line_spacing].
Color of the shadow effect. If alpha is [code]0[/code], no shadow will be drawn.
Offset of the shadow effect, in pixels.
